wikipedia_page.main: Joseph Arnot Lorimer Buick (born 1 July 1933) is a Scottish former footballer who made 31 appearances in the Football League playing for Lincoln City. He played as a wing half. He also played for his local team, Broughty Athletic, and in English non-league football for Weymouth, Cheltenham Town, and Ruston Bucyrus.
